reviewText: Both movies are good with great actors.  They are full of action and the story lines are good. Will watch them again.
Title: Drop Zone / Hard Rain

reviewText: The mind is a fascinating thing....I remembered both films differently than they are....not quite as good. The DVD is a great buy (2 movies for the price of 1), and delivery was fast.
Title: Drop Zone / Hard Rain

reviewText: Really Good DVD.  When I buy used DVD's I always clean them before using them with a special cloth just to make for sure that they work properly.  This one was already cleaned, but of course I cleaned it again and the quality is really great.
Title: Drop Zone / Hard Rain

reviewText: both movies are great, only draw back is that one movie is 2.35 aspect ratio and the second is 1.85 aspect ratio and its not labled as such.
Title: Drop Zone / Hard Rain

reviewText: the both movies are action packed. hard rain has the better story line, Wesley SNIPES IS GOOD IN DROP ZONE I WISH THERE WERE MORE ACTION DOUBLE PACKSLIKE THIS ONE.
Title: Drop Zone / Hard Rain

reviewText: Well i just really wanted hard Rain but since that is no loner out i had to get these two movies together, Not bad though, to me both movies are great, just tired of cheap boxes how these dvds come in.Both actors are great in these movies
